easyunit::TestPrinter Class Reference

A TestPrinter is a class used by the TestRegistry to print results of executed TestCases. More...

#include <testprinter.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void print (const TestResult *testResult)=0
 Print the details of a given TestResult instance.

Detailed Description

A TestPrinter is a class used by the TestRegistry to print results of executed TestCases.

This is an abstract class, so no default behavior for the print method is provided.

See also:
easyunit::DefaultTestPrinter

Member Function Documentation

virtual void easyunit::TestPrinter::print (  const TestResult *  testResult  )  [pure virtual]
 

Print the details of a given TestResult instance.

This method must be overridden by subclasses since it is abstract.

Parameters:
testResult TestResult instance that the user wish to print
